home.title: MDT Wallet
home.claimable_mdt: You have {num} MDT to claim today!

transfer.title: Transfer Out
transfer.successdetail_email_nonuser: Your transaction will be completed when your friend claims the tokens.
transfer.successdetail_ethwallet:
Your MDT is on its way...
 We are processing the transaction. Please check the status in your transaction history.
transfer.transferlist_ethtitle: Transfer MDT to External ETH Wallet
transfer.tutorial_description: MDT is an ERC20 token. Transferring to an ETH wallet incurrs gas fee. When you transfer your MDT to an ETH wallet, the gas fee is calculated in MDT and deducted from your transaction. Depending on how clogged the network is, gas fee or transaction fee will fluctuate.

qrcode.title: Scan QR Code
qrcode.align_description: Align QR code within frame to scan
qrcode.eth_scan_wrong_type: Please scan ETH address QR code only

transaction.title: Transaction
transaction.problemDidNotMakeIt: I did not make this transaction.
transaction.problemMakeItAccidentally: I made this transaction by accident.
transaction.popupCancelDescription: We will not send the recipient an email notification when you cancel your transaction.

phone.title: Phone Setup
phone.skip_setup_content: Are you sure? Adding a phone number will make your account more secure. If you skip now, you can always add your phone number in Settings -> Security.
phone.add_phone_content:
Add a phone number to your account. 
 We will ask you to enter a verification code.
phone.change_phone_content:
Update your phone number on your account. 
 We will ask you to enter a veriffication code.
phone.verify_phone_content: A verification code has been sent to your registered phone number:
phone.already_setup_title: You already set up Phone Number
phone.already_setup_content: Would you like to change your Phone Number?
phone.pinSetupPopupDescription: You can add your phone number after you set up your PIN.

passcode.already_setup_content: Would you like to change your PIN?
passcode.not_match: PIN does not match, please try again
passcode.pin_setup_remind_content: Passcode is important to keep your money safe

reportProblem.title: Report Problem
reportProblem.description:
Use the form below to send us your comments.
Please describe the problem as specific as possible. For example, please include which account you are having trouble with, what did you do and what happened.
If you provide your email address, you agree that we may contact you to better understand the comments you submitted.
reportProblem.errorMessage:
Sorry your comments cannot be submitted now.
You can contact token@mdt.co for help.

earnMDT.title: Earn MDT
earnMDT.rewardErrorMessage: Failed to claim reward. Please refresh and try again.

tutorial.slide_1_description: Your MDT balance is constant, but your USD balance will fluctuate with the exchange rate, and sometimes it can be volatile.
tutorial.slide_2_description: MyMDT rewards you for finishing super easy tasks such as sending an email. The more tasks you finish, the more tokens you will earn.
tutorial.slide_3_description: You can transfer your MDT to a friend, your crypto wallet or just spend it in MyMDT for some fun stuff (coming soon) !
tutorial.slide_4_description: All transactions are authorized by your PIN. Add your phone number for more security.

betaTesting.title: MDT Wallet Beta Testing
betaTesting.description: Please enter a valid access code, and press “Import Account(s)” to begin your MDT wallet experience.
betaTesting.agreementDetail: By clicking the button below, your email accounts in MailTime will automatically logged into the MDT wallet.
betaTesting.NDA: NDA for Beta Testing with MailTime
betaTesting.agreementCheckbox1: I agree to {0} of MDT Wallet Beta Testing

twoFactorAuthentication.setupDescription: Two-factor authentication (2FA) is a security feature. It is recommended to turn it on to make your account more secure. When 2FA is turned on, you will be asked to enter an SMS code or use Google 2FA for actions like logging in from an unknown device, or making transactions.
twoFactorAuthentication.pinSetupPopupDescription: You can set up two-tactor authentication after you set up your PIN and add your phone number or set up Google Authenticator.
twoFactorAuthentication.disable2FAPopupDescription:
2FA is strongly recommended to protect your account and assets.
By turning off 2FA, you agree that you understand the risk for not enabling this security feature.

googleAuth.pinSetupPopupDescription:
You can set up Google Authenticator after you set up your PIN.

What is Google Authenticator?
Google Authenticator adds a second layer of security to your account. When two-factor authentication is on, you will asked to enter your PIN and a verification code from the Google Authenticator when making transactions or logging into the account.
googleAuth.step1Remark: Please make sure that your Google Authenticator app is installed.
googleAuth.step2Procedure1:
If you are new to Google Authenticator, tap on “BEGIN” or “BEGIN SETUP”

If you have used the app before, tap “+” to add an account.
googleAuth.step2Procedure2: Select “Manual entry” or “Enter a provided key”.
googleAuth.step2Procedure3: Use the following as your key.
googleAuth.step2Procedure3Remark: You can screenshot this page to keep a copy
googleAuth.step2Procedure4: Make sure “Time Based” is selected and tap “Add” to complete.
googleAuth.disablePopupContentCase1:
You have already set up your Google Authenticator. Do you want to disable it?

Your current 2FA is using Google Authenticator. Your 2FA will switch to SMS if you proceed.
googleAuth.disablePopupContentCase2:
You have already set up your Google Authenticator. Do you want to disable it?

Your current 2FA is using Google Authenticator. Your 2FA be disabled if you proceed. You can set up your phone number and turn on 2FA again.
googleAuth.disablePopupContentCase3: You have already set up your Google Authenticator. Do you want to disable it?
googleAuth.continueSetupPopupDescription:
You are halfway setting up your Google Authenticator.

Click “Continue” to continue setting up your Google Authenticator. You will be asked to input the 6-digit verfication code.

Click “Start Over” to discard current progress and you will be provided with a new key.
